Tasks.Task Description: Use Azure Monitor to track metrics such as storage capacity, transaction rates, and latency for Azure Table Storage. Identify and address any anomalies or performance issues.
Ensure that data stored in Azure Table Storage is encrypted using Azure Storage Service Encryption (SSE). Regularly verify encryption status and compliance with security policies.
Regularly back up Azure Table Storage data and perform restore tests to ensure data integrity and availability in case of failures.
Review and update access controls for Azure Table Storage, including Shared Access Signatures (SAS) and role-based access control (RBAC). Ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Analyze and optimize table partitioning to improve query performance and reduce latency. Ensure partitions align with application access patterns.
Test failover scenarios to ensure Azure Table Storage can recover from regional outages or service disruptions. Validate the effectiveness of geo-redundancy configurations.
Analyze Azure Table Storage usage and associated costs. Identify opportunities for cost optimization, such as tier adjustments or data lifecycle management.
Review and update security policies for Azure Table Storage to address new threats or changes in organizational requirements.
Ensure that all operational procedures, configurations, and troubleshooting guides for Azure Table Storage are up-to-date and accessible.
Conduct regular compliance checks to ensure Azure Table Storage adheres to relevant regulations and industry standards.
Conduct incident response drills to prepare the team for potential security incidents or Azure Table Storage outages. Ensure familiarity with procedures and protocols.
Evaluate the SLA performance of Azure Table Storage. Address any issues or deviations from the agreed SLA metrics.
Develop and execute plans for Azure Table Storage upgrades or expansions as needed. Ensure minimal disruption during these activities.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new Azure Table Storage features, best practices, and security measures.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding Azure Table Storage performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
